about_the_game:
Made in Hong Kong. By Unreal Engine 5.1. With TSR (Temporal Super Resolution).

Background:
This This Rice is a restaurant simulator. Pack the lunch box with two sides for customers. Chinese (Cantonese) voice-over.

Features:
This This Rice is a short game. Game play is around 15mins long.

> 1st person POV simulator.
> Get the rice. Get two sides. Grab the money. Deliver the lunch box.
> Translation reference in game. Take this golden chance to learn Cantonese.
> No post-processing filter / No head bobbing in game.
> Wide FOV for comfortably gameplay.
> Linear gameplay.
> Prequel to the game - Hoiwa Hub (Already available on Steam).

Settings:
- Supports Full Screen / Windowed Mode
- Supports TSR (50% / 75% / 100%)

By Unreal Engine 5.1

name: 兩餸飯 | This This Rice

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel 7th generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 (or AMD equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 8 GB of VRAM is required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel 10th generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3000 series (or AMD equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 8 GB of VRAM is required

short_description: Simulator game made in Hong Kong. Pack the lunch box. Take the money. By Unreal Engine 5.1.
